title: Men's Faded Hoodie
description:
Get ready to kick back in style with our Men's Faded Hoodie. This laid-back essential boasts a relaxed fit and a mid-weight blend of 80% cotton and 20% recycled polyester fleece for ultimate comfort. Featuring a pullover hood, dropped shoulders, and a kangaroo pocket, it's as functional as it is fashionable.

Benefits

  • Durability and Sustainability
  • Functional Design Features
  • Effortless Style
  • Unmatched Comfort

Features

  • 9.4 oz
  • Pullover hood
  • drop shoulder
  • kangaroo pocket
  • self-fabric lined hood
  • no drawcord
  • garment dyed
  • sleeve cuff ribbing

For environmental and human friendly reason, this product is only made when you order it. We will send you tracking information as soon as it's in the mail.
